name: @waylay/mongolabGetItem
description:
Generic mongolab that returns back the item in the database. Should be replace with more specific one for your use case. You need API mongoKey. Input parameters are:
  • item, or you can as well provide here another sensor name that has an item in rawData response
  • identifier which will be used to match the item in the collection
  • database
This is just a demo sensor, not only becasue you would be better off with more concrete implementation (where you define rawData), but also it is better to make search of the item via REST call rather than accessing array client side. Also note that the underscore package is used with __ .
